LocalizedTexts.AltID: Welcome to the Clock Tower!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Welcome to the Clock Tower!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We’ve arranged for an ancient device to be delivered to you.
LocalizedTexts.Value: We've arranged for an ancient device to be delivered to you

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Use the remote on your left to call it down
LocalizedTexts.Value: Use the remote on your left to call it down

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great! We can’t help you open it, we don't know how it works!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great! We can't help you open it. We don't know how it works!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: It looks like it needs power,
LocalizedTexts.Value: It looks like it needs power

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Try the button with the energy icon
LocalizedTexts.Value: Try the button with the energy icon

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The lever sprung up!
LocalizedTexts.Value: The lever sprung up!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: You could try pulling it to power up the device.
LocalizedTexts.Value: You could try pulling it to power up the device

LocalizedTexts.AltID: It looks like there's a hint.
LocalizedTexts.Value: It looks like there's a hint

LocalizedTexts.AltID: It says 1 2 3 4, very original.
LocalizedTexts.Value: It says "1 2 3 4", very original

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Huh, a wheel, it looks like it’s hard to turn
LocalizedTexts.Value: Huh, a wheel. It looks like it's hard to turn

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Try turning the wheel with two hands.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Try turning the wheel with two hands

LocalizedTexts.AltID: That panel looks interactive,
LocalizedTexts.Value: That panel looks interactive

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Try swiping and pressing the panel with your finger
LocalizedTexts.Value: Try swiping and pressing the panel with your finger

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Try pressing the buttons on the panel
LocalizedTexts.Value: Try pressing the buttons on the panel

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Swipe the hologram to change color, or use the buttons
LocalizedTexts.Value: Swipe the hologram to change colour, or use the buttons

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Print it out with the button and place it on the build hologram at the back.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Print it out with the button and place it on the build hologram at the back

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great choice!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great choice!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Keep going with the next piece
LocalizedTexts.Value: Keep going with the next piece

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There are three more parts to build
LocalizedTexts.Value: There are three more parts to build

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Looks good!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Looks good!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There are two more parts to build
LocalizedTexts.Value: There are two more parts to build

LocalizedTexts.AltID: One piece to go!
LocalizedTexts.Value: One piece to go!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Keep going with the last piece
LocalizedTexts.Value: Keep going with the last piece

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There's just one more part to build
LocalizedTexts.Value: There's just one more part to build

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Those rocks have a glowing secret inside
LocalizedTexts.Value: Those rocks have a glowing secret inside

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Try to crush them with your hand!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Try to crush them with your hand!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Wow, beautiful crystal
LocalizedTexts.Value: Wow, beautiful crystal!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: What happens if you place a crystal into the glove?
LocalizedTexts.Value: What happens if you place a crystal in the glove?

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Place a crystal into the palm of the glove
LocalizedTexts.Value: Place a crystal in the palm of the glove

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Put your hands in, and let's see what happens!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Put your hands in, and let's see what happens!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's see what happens when you put the gloves on!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's see what happens when you put the gloves on!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: That’s it, your palm blast and shield abilities are active again!
LocalizedTexts.Value: That's it, your Palm Blast and Shield abilities are active again!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: You can use these abilities to reset any data that has become degraded.
LocalizedTexts.Value: You can use these abilities to reset any data that has become degraded

LocalizedTexts.AltID: That testing drone will place some targets for you to practice shooting
LocalizedTexts.Value: That testing drone will place some targets for you to practise shooting

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's make this interesting, the drone will shoot back, block it’s shots
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's make this interesting. The drone will shoot back – block its shots

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The one with the highest score wins
LocalizedTexts.Value: The one with the highest score wins

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great work, looks like you've got the hang of it
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great work! It looks like you've got the hang of it

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great job creator, let's head back to the Hub now!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great job, creator. Let's head back to the Hub now!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Woah! Hi there! I’m glad you made it!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Woah! Hi there! I'm glad you made it!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: I have this for you!
LocalizedTexts.Value: I have this for you!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great! Use this teleport gesture and follow me!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great! Use this teleport gesture and follow me!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Well done! Now use the snap turn gesture to turn!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Well done! Now use the snap-turn gesture to turn!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Over here!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Over here!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Come here! I need your help with something!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Come here! I need your help with something!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: This barrier has cut us off from the rest of the town!
LocalizedTexts.Value: This barrier has cut us off from the rest of the town!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: I think we can break it down with 3 of these gravity devices located around the area.
LocalizedTexts.Value: I think we can break it down with three of these gravity devices located around the area

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Place all 3 into the barrier and activate them so we can get through!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Place all three into the barrier and activate them so we can get through!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The first one is over there! I’ll stay here and get the barrier ready!
LocalizedTexts.Value: The first one is over there! I'll stay here and get the barrier ready!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Hello!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Hello!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There’s been a crash! And my balloon is stuck!
LocalizedTexts.Value: There's been a crash! And my balloon is stuck!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Follow me!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Follow me!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: It’s over here!
LocalizedTexts.Value: It's over here!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Yay! Thank you so much!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Yay! Thank you so much!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: I saw another device just like that one over there!
LocalizedTexts.Value: I saw another device just like that one over there!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: I have what you’re looking for! But you need to show me the secret hand gesture!
LocalizedTexts.Value: I have what you're looking for! But you need to show me the secret hand gesture!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Okay! I can see you’re one of us! Take it and help the town!
LocalizedTexts.Value: OK! I can see that you're one of us! Take it and help the town!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great! Let's go!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great! Let's go!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Make sure you avoid the cameras as you pull the switches to power up the door!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Make sure that you avoid the cameras as you pull the switches to power up the door!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: If the cameras see you, all the switches will reset, so be careful!
LocalizedTexts.Value: If the cameras see you, all of the switches will reset, so be careful!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great, one lever pulled, two more to go!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great, one lever pulled, two more to go!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Almost there!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Almost there!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Oh no! The levers have reset!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Oh no! The levers have reset!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: That’s the last one, just open the door and we’re free!
LocalizedTexts.Value: That's the last one. Just open the door, and we're free!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Amazing! You did it!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Amazing! You did it!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Come on! We’re one step closer!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Come on! We're one step closer!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great! We made it back!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great! We made it back!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The Generator’s portal opened up here, let’s check it out
LocalizedTexts.Value: The generator's portal opened up here. Let's check it out

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Uh Oh! It doesn't look safe for you
LocalizedTexts.Value: Uh oh! It doesn't look safe for you

LocalizedTexts.AltID: and this drone's not equipped to fix anything
LocalizedTexts.Value: and this drone's not equipped to fix anything

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Begin this drone’s upgrade sequence
LocalizedTexts.Value: Begin this drone's upgrade sequence

LocalizedTexts.AltID: then direct us to fix the broken generator!
LocalizedTexts.Value: then direct us to fix the broken generator!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Here goes nothing, press the button to begin!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Here goes nothing. Press the button to begin!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Come on, press the button to start the upgrade
LocalizedTexts.Value: Come on, press the button to start the upgrade

LocalizedTexts.AltID: If we had arms we’d press the upgrade button ourself, but then again we wouldn't need to
LocalizedTexts.Value: If we had arms, we'd press the upgrade button ourselves, but then again, we wouldn't need to

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Just press the button! What’s the matter, afraid to make a mess!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Just press the button! What's the matter? Afraid to make a mess?

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Upgrade sequence initialized!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Upgrade sequence initialised!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's get started!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's get started!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Please find the parts and rebuild me!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Please find the parts and rebuild me!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Nice, these will come in handy!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Nice, these will come in handy!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: So you picked that color huh.. good choice!
LocalizedTexts.Value: So, you picked that colour huh... good choice!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Oh Hi! Nice to see you again!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Oh hi! Nice to see you again!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Awesome, I feel connected now!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Awesome, I feel connected now!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Wooohooo, let's start lifting!!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Woohoo, let's start lifting!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Ooooooo, I can fly again!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Ooooooo, I can fly again!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great job Creator
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great job, creator

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Say a command to me and I will respond and act on it
LocalizedTexts.Value: Say a command to me, and I will respond and act on it

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's see what we can do
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's see what we can do

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let’s do it, we can work as a team!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's do it! We can work as a team!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: To power the Hub above us we need to get these generators running
LocalizedTexts.Value: To power the Hub above us, we need to get these generators running

LocalizedTexts.AltID: At Generator 1 it looks like somethings obstructing the blades
LocalizedTexts.Value: At Generator 1, it looks like something's obstructing the blades

LocalizedTexts.AltID: At Generator 2 a fuse needs replacing
LocalizedTexts.Value: At Generator 2, a fuse needs replacing

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Once both generators are working, pull the center lever and push the button to power the Hub
LocalizedTexts.Value: Once both generators are working, pull the central lever and push the button to power the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: I'll head to the Generator, we can work as a team!
LocalizedTexts.Value: I'll head to the Generator. We can work as a team!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Use the map to navigate the area
LocalizedTexts.Value: Use the map to navigate the area

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The buttons on the map will help us find the problems
LocalizedTexts.Value: The buttons on the map will help us find the problems

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's move to the right side and see what the problem is
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's move to the right-hand side and see what the problem is

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Fly to left side
LocalizedTexts.Value: Fly to left-hand side

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Fly to right side
LocalizedTexts.Value: Fly to right-hand side

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Oh no, the fuse is broken!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Oh no, the fuse is broken!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Pick up fuse
LocalizedTexts.Value: Pick up fuse

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Pick up broken fuse
LocalizedTexts.Value: Pick up broken fuse

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Place fuse In
LocalizedTexts.Value: Place fuse in

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Fly to left side
LocalizedTexts.Value: Fly to left-hand side

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Ah yes, we found a replacement!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Ah yes, we found a replacement!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Woohoo, we have fixed it!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Woohoo! we've fixed it!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let’s move to the left side and see what the problem is!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's move to the left-hand side and see what the problem is!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Pick up box
LocalizedTexts.Value: Pick up box

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Drop the box
LocalizedTexts.Value: Drop the box

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Fly to right side
LocalizedTexts.Value: Fly to right-hand side

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Ah, the box is blocking the turbine!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Ah, the box is blocking the turbine!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Wow, that was heavy!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Wow, that was heavy!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Hurray, great job! We have power now, lets go and power up the generators
LocalizedTexts.Value: Hurray, well done! We have power now. Let's go and power up the generators

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Pull the lever and power up the network!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Pull the lever and power up the network!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We did it! Power has been restored!
LocalizedTexts.Value: We did it! Power has been restored!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great job, come find me back at the Hub
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great job! Come find me back at the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Wow, it’s amazing up here! Isn't the air fresh?
LocalizedTexts.Value: Wow, it's amazing up here! Isn't the air fresh?

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Wait, we don't have lungs… well, it looks fresh
LocalizedTexts.Value: Wait, we don't have lungs… Well, it looks fresh

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's take a look around
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's take a look around

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The package we need is floating outside
LocalizedTexts.Value: The package we need is floating outside

LocalizedTexts.AltID: we need to build a new kite to collect it
LocalizedTexts.Value: we need to build a new kite to collect it

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Everything looks operational
LocalizedTexts.Value: Everything looks operational

LocalizedTexts.AltID: You'll need tools to move the kite's parts in to place
LocalizedTexts.Value: You'll need tools to move the kite's parts into place

LocalizedTexts.AltID: These are the Kinesis Modules, pick them up
LocalizedTexts.Value: These are the Kinesis Modules. Pick them up

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great! Aim the Kinesis Module at the kite parts and guide them in to place
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great! Aim the Kinesis Module at the kite parts and guide them in to place

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Start with the Stabilizer, that stops the kite from crashing
LocalizedTexts.Value: Start with the Stabiliser – that stops the kite from crashing

LocalizedTexts.AltID: That’s the Stabilizer in place, it’s probably what failed on the last kite
LocalizedTexts.Value: That's the Stabiliser in place. It's probably what failed on the last kite

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Next up is fuelling the skywriter module
LocalizedTexts.Value: Next up is fuelling the skywriter module

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great! That’s the skywriter module installed
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great! That's the skywriter module installed

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Next, the kite needs a Collector, that’s how the kite collects packages
LocalizedTexts.Value: Next, the kite needs a Collector. That's how the kite collects packages

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Now that the kite has a Collector it will be able to collect the lost packages outside
LocalizedTexts.Value: Now that the kite has a Collector, it will be able to collect the lost packages outside

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The kite just needs wings now
LocalizedTexts.Value: The kite just needs wings now

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Ah the wings, perfect! What kind of kite would it be without wings!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Ah the wings, perfect! What kind of kite would it be without wings?!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Fantastic work! You did it!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Fantastic work! You did it!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Look at these! You can paint the wings! That’s fun!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Look at these! You can paint the wings! That's fun!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Drop the Kinesis Modules and attach the spray guns
LocalizedTexts.Value: Drop the Kinesis Modules and attach the spray guns

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Drop the construction tools and attach the spray guns
LocalizedTexts.Value: Drop the construction tools and attach the spray guns

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great choice! Once you’re happy with how it looks use the Kinesis Module to dry the paint
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great choice! Once you're happy with how it looks, use the Kinesis Module to dry the paint

LocalizedTexts.AltID: All that’s left is to launch the kite, pull back the hologram then release to launch it!
LocalizedTexts.Value: All that's left is to launch the kite, pull back the hologram, then release to launch it!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Woah!! Look at it fly! Let's go see it soar
LocalizedTexts.Value: Woah! Look at it fly! Let's go and watch it soar

LocalizedTexts.AltID: It’s working! We can use it collect the packages floating around
LocalizedTexts.Value: It's working! We can use it collect the packages floating around

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Oh look, more Kinesis Modules, give them a try!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Oh look, more Kinesis Modules! Give them a try!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Ah, they work like strings! Fly the kite by pulling the strings forward and back to collect the packages
LocalizedTexts.Value: Ah, they work like strings! Fly the kite by pulling the strings forwards and backwards to collect the packages

LocalizedTexts.AltID: when you have enough deposit them into the ring to the left
LocalizedTexts.Value: when you have enough, deposit them into the ring to the left

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great you have all the packages! Let's deposit them
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great – you have all the packages! Let's deposit them

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Those packages will be waiting for you back at the Hub! Really great work!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Those packages will be waiting for you back at the Hub! Really great work!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We’ll go back now, and start preparing the systems for the data in that package
LocalizedTexts.Value: We'll go back now, and start preparing the systems for the data in that package

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great job Creator!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Well done, creator!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There is so much potential in those hands.
LocalizedTexts.Value: There is so much potential in those hands

LocalizedTexts.AltID: travel to the clocktower where we’ve arranged a delivery of some ancient technology that only you can unlock.
LocalizedTexts.Value: travel to the Clock Tower, where we've arranged a delivery of some ancient technology that only you can unlock

LocalizedTexts.AltID: If you can figure out how to get it to work, you’ll be one step closer to regaining your powers.
LocalizedTexts.Value: If you can figure out how to get it to work, you'll be one step closer to regaining your powers

LocalizedTexts.AltID: In the town you will meet a friend of ours, he has something for you.
LocalizedTexts.Value: In the town, you will meet a friend of ours. He has something for you

LocalizedTexts.AltID: It will help you move around our world with ease,
LocalizedTexts.Value: It will help you move around our world with ease

LocalizedTexts.AltID: and maybe you can help the robots there while you explore the area.
LocalizedTexts.Value: and maybe you can help the robots there while you explore the area

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We cannot gain access to the generator below us and the mechanisms have seized.
LocalizedTexts.Value: We cannot gain access to the generator below us, and the mechanisms have seized

LocalizedTexts.AltID: When we found you we saw a glimpse of the machinery that needs fixing in a portal.
LocalizedTexts.Value: When we found you, we saw a glimpse of the machinery that needs fixing in a portal

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We should return to your home and investigate.
LocalizedTexts.Value: We should return to your home and investigate

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Lots of packages went missing when the Delivery system failed.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Lots of packages went missing when the delivery system failed

LocalizedTexts.AltID: One of the packages contained coordinate information for all the other worlds that the Hub connects to.
LocalizedTexts.Value: One of the packages contained coordinate information for all of the other worlds that the Hub connects to

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Travel to the Mountains, rebuild the Kite and collect the lost packages.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Travel to the mountains, rebuild the kite and collect the lost packages

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We'll find what we need, once they are delivered here to the hub
LocalizedTexts.Value: We'll find what we need, once they've been delivered here to the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great work, the robots from the town are now able to enter the hub.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great work! The robots from the town are now able to enter the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Once the hub’s active again they will be free to explore other worlds again.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Once the Hub's active again, they will be free to explore other worlds again

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Now you can use your newly enabled ability to teleport around this area
LocalizedTexts.Value: Now you can use your newly enabled ability to teleport around this area

LocalizedTexts.AltID: That was intense! Hopefully you’ve grasped the power in those gloves of yours
LocalizedTexts.Value: That was intense! Hopefully, you've grasped the power in those gloves of yours

LocalizedTexts.AltID: They'll help you get the Hub up and running again.
LocalizedTexts.Value: They'll help you get the Hub up and running again

LocalizedTexts.AltID: See that! The portal's mechanisms are powering up!
LocalizedTexts.Value: See that! The portal's mechanisms are powering up!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: And with these upgrades I can help even more.
LocalizedTexts.Value: And with these upgrades, I can help even more

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great work, It will take some time to sort through all the packages.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great work! It will take some time to sort through all of the packages

LocalizedTexts.AltID: When we’re done we’ll let you know
LocalizedTexts.Value: When we're done, we'll let you know

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Until then try another portal, we’re getting closer to restoring the hub
LocalizedTexts.Value: Until then, try another portal. We're getting closer to restoring the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The packages from the mountains have arrived, great work up there!
LocalizedTexts.Value: The packages from the mountains have arrived. Great work up there!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: While you’ve been busy, we found the missing portal coordinates.
LocalizedTexts.Value: While you were busy, we found the missing portal coordinates

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We’ll go input the coordinates
LocalizedTexts.Value: We'll go input the coordinates

LocalizedTexts.AltID: That’s it!
LocalizedTexts.Value: That's it!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: With the other systems restored we’ll transfer the data to the portals and you’ll be free to explore!
LocalizedTexts.Value: With the other systems restored, we'll transfer the data to the portals and you'll be free to explore!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: You can also use your laser grabbers to realign the platforms
LocalizedTexts.Value: You can also use your laser grabbers to realign the platforms

LocalizedTexts.AltID: and gain access to the portal you need to complete your journey.
LocalizedTexts.Value: and gain access to the portal you need to complete your journey

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We’re getting close to restoring the hub
LocalizedTexts.Value: We're getting close to restoring the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: You did it! You’ve got all your abilities!
LocalizedTexts.Value: You did it! You've got all your abilities!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: And everything out the world has been repaired
LocalizedTexts.Value: And everything out in the world has been repaired

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Now you just need to repair the hub
LocalizedTexts.Value: Now you just need to repair the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Use the abilities you have unlocked to find and repair each of the broken systems inside the hub
LocalizedTexts.Value: Use the abilities you've unlocked to find and repair each of the broken systems inside the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: You will need to teleport around to find them all
LocalizedTexts.Value: You will need to teleport around to find them all

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's use Palm Blast to clear the blocked portal tracks
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's use Palm Blast to clear the blocked portal tracks

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The tracks are blocked, use your Palm Blast to clear them
LocalizedTexts.Value: The tracks are blocked. Use your Palm Blast to clear them

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Keep going!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Keep going!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Making good progress, but there's more to clear up!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Making good progress, but there's more to clear up!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Looking good, but there's more to clear
LocalizedTexts.Value: Looking good, but there's more to clear

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The mountain packages are here, use the console to bring them in
LocalizedTexts.Value: The mountain packages are here. Use the console to bring them in

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Use the console to bring in the packages
LocalizedTexts.Value: Use the console to bring in the packages

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Brilliant work, all the systems have been restored
LocalizedTexts.Value: Brilliant work! All of the systems have been restored

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We need to use this drone to connect the coordinates to the portals
LocalizedTexts.Value: We need to use this drone to connect the coordinates to the portals

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Come on! Your next adventure is just ahead!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Come on! Your next adventure is just ahead!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Use your Palm Blast to clear the tracks
LocalizedTexts.Value: Use your Palm Blast to clear the tracks

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great the tracks are clear!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great, the tracks are clear!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The Hub is almost ready
LocalizedTexts.Value: The Hub is almost ready

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's get the hub's coordinates from the packages you collected
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's get the Hub's coordinates from the packages you collected

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Great! We've found the missing portal coordinates
LocalizedTexts.Value: Great! We've found the missing portal coordinates

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's go and insert them.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's go and insert them

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Amazing! So many worlds to explore!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Amazing! So many worlds to explore!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Thank you for everything, Creator!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Thank you for everything, creator!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We’ll never forget what you’ve done!
LocalizedTexts.Value: We'll never forget what you've done!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There they are!
LocalizedTexts.Value: There they are!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Coming through!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Coming through!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: About time, I've been trapped down there forever!
LocalizedTexts.Value: About time! I've been trapped down there forever!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We finally found you! We’ve been searching everywhere
LocalizedTexts.Value: We finally found you! We've been searching everywhere

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Only to find you in this strange place, unbelievable
LocalizedTexts.Value: Only to find you in this strange place. Unbelievable!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: So, you live here now? It's nice, yes nice! Cozy
LocalizedTexts.Value: So, you live here now? It's nice, yes, nice! Cosy

LocalizedTexts.AltID: And we’re sure this is the Creator?
LocalizedTexts.Value: And we're sure this is the creator?

LocalizedTexts.AltID: They don’t look right, too organic
LocalizedTexts.Value: They don't look right – too organic

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There’s only one way to find out, place your hand in the scanner
LocalizedTexts.Value: There's only one way to find out. Place your hand in the scanner

LocalizedTexts.AltID: You are the Creator, but this isn't right!
LocalizedTexts.Value: You are the creator, but this isn't right!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: You don't have any of your abilities
LocalizedTexts.Value: You don't have any of your abilities

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Maybe they can recover their abilities at the same time as they help us!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Maybe they can recover their abilities while they help us!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Yes, we can help each other
LocalizedTexts.Value: Yes, we can help each other

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There are five areas in our world
LocalizedTexts.Value: There are five areas in our world

LocalizedTexts.AltID: the Town
LocalizedTexts.Value: the Town

LocalizedTexts.AltID: the Clocktower
LocalizedTexts.Value: the Clock Tower

LocalizedTexts.AltID: the Mountains
LocalizedTexts.Value: the Mountains

LocalizedTexts.AltID: the Generator
LocalizedTexts.Value: the Generator

LocalizedTexts.AltID: and the Hub
LocalizedTexts.Value: and the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Go on! Try a button
LocalizedTexts.Value: Go on! Try a button

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Last chance, and we're moving on
LocalizedTexts.Value: Last chance, and we're moving on

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Fine I guess you don't have to
LocalizedTexts.Value: Fine, I guess you don't have to

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The Hub connects to other incredible worlds,
LocalizedTexts.Value: The Hub connects to other incredible worlds

LocalizedTexts.AltID: well… it would… if it was working
LocalizedTexts.Value: well… it would… if it were working

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The town’s security system has malfunctioned
LocalizedTexts.Value: The town's security system has malfunctioned

LocalizedTexts.AltID: now it’s inhabitants are trapped
LocalizedTexts.Value: now it's inhabitants are trapped

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The Generator should power the hub, but it's in need of repairs
LocalizedTexts.Value: The Generator should power the Hub, but it's in need of repairs

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There’s a workshop in the clocktower
LocalizedTexts.Value: There's a workshop in the Clock Tower

LocalizedTexts.AltID: build your gloves to gain their abilities
LocalizedTexts.Value: build your gloves to gain their abilities

LocalizedTexts.AltID: The Hub's missing component was delivered to the Mountains
LocalizedTexts.Value: The Hub's missing component was delivered to the mountains

LocalizedTexts.AltID: it needs to be retrieved
LocalizedTexts.Value: it needs to be retrieved

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Press the button to travel to the Hub
LocalizedTexts.Value: Press the button to travel to the Hub

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Oh, this isn't the Hub! Lucky the balloon was here!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Oh, this isn't the Hub! Lucky the balloon was here!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: We’ll work this out, we just need to calculate the coordinates
LocalizedTexts.Value: We'll work this out. We just need to calculate the coordinates

LocalizedTexts.AltID: There we go! These are the right coordinates
LocalizedTexts.Value: There we go! These are the right coordinates

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Are we sure?
LocalizedTexts.Value: Are we sure?

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Yes of course
LocalizedTexts.Value: Yes, of course

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Wow, we made it, I didn't doubt it for a second!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Wow, we made it. I didn't doubt it for a second!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Yes you did!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Yes, you did!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Quit arguing, we should get started!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Quit arguing, we should get started!

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Each of these four orbs will transport you to the areas that need help
LocalizedTexts.Value: Each of these four orbs will transport you to the areas that need help

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Place an orb into the console to begin
LocalizedTexts.Value: Place an orb into the console to begin

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Let's see if we can't put this old drone to good use.
LocalizedTexts.Value: Let's see if we can't put this old drone to good use

LocalizedTexts.AltID: Oh! There’s no voice box… no problem!
LocalizedTexts.Value: Oh! There's no voice box… No problem!
